notes.title: Authorsâ€™ contributions
notes.p: AC, ANJ and BP participated in the design of study and preparation of the manuscript. AC, DC, ANJ, ATJ, DR, AW, JI, RM and BP were responsible for plant extraction, mosquito rearing and experimental testing. AC, ANJ, DA, AK and BP assisted in data analysis and interpreted the findings. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
